original_text: And when the days of the feast had run their course, Job would send and consecrate them, and he would rise early in the morning and offer burnt offerings according to the number of them all. For Job said, “It may be that my children have sinned, and cursed God in their hearts.” Thus Job did continually.
korean_text: 그들이 차례대로 잔치를 끝내면 욥이 그들을 불러다가 성결하게 하되 아침에 일어나서 그들의 명수대로 번제를 드렸으니 이는 욥이 말하기를 혹시 내 아들들이 죄를 범하여 마음으로 하나님을 욕되게 하였을까 함이라 욥의 행위가 항상 이러하였더라

sentences.original_text: And when the days of the feast had run their course
Job would send and consecrate them
and he would rise early in the morning
according to the number of them all
It may be that my children have sinned
sentences.korean_translation: 어쩌면 내 자녀들이 죄를 지었을지도 모르고

sentences.original_text: and cursed God in their hearts
